nodes.text: New Plympto was a location in the galaxy's Core Worlds that was the homeworld of the Nosaurian species and was a safe world for the Alliance to Restore the Republic. A map of the galaxy with a legend listing the various Alliance safe worlds, starfighter hubs at level five or higher, rebel operations sectors and regional headquarters, and shadow planets with deep space caches, included New Plympto.
It was the homeworld of the Nosaurian podracer Clegg Holdfast.

New Plympto was first mentioned in the Star Wars Legends reference book Inside the Worlds of Star Wars: Episode I which was written by Kristin Lund and released in 2000. The world was confirmed to be canon in the reference book Ultimate Star Wars, which was released in 2015.
